DOC.brief_summary: Patients receive patient assistance program therapy Hepatitis C enrol study . All patient receive PegIntron Rebetol ( accord label ) patient assistance program , include ( 1 ) medication use treatment ( psychiatric medication ) ; ( 2 ) intervention ( nurse support ) ; ( 3 ) educational literature . This study compare similar study clinic use various patient support program purpose design future comparative phase IV study .
DOC.brief_title: Adherence Patients Receiving PegIntron Rebetol Hepatitis C Conjunction With Patient Assistance Program ( Study P04206 )
DOC.criteria: Patients chronic hepatitis C naive treatment
